resources.string: Latest exchange rate for CryptoCurrencies from CryptoCompare public Api in Bitcoin(BTC) and Ethereum(ETH).
Get the latest exchange rate between cryptocurrencies BTC and ETH and 20 world currencies

Select a base currency(ETH or BTC).From the drop down menu select the world currency you would like to convert to.Click the Add button.Finally click on the card created with the selected world currency and Enter value!
